Uses of Interface
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.filter.FilterConfigurator

Packages that use FilterConfigurator 
Package Description
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.filter
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for data filters for information propagation simulations.

  • Uses of FilterConfigurator in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.filter

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.filter that implement FilterConfigurator 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BasicFilterConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Class for configuring a basic filter, which does not modify the data.
    class  ContainsInformationFeatureFilterConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Class for configuring a basic filter, which leaves only those information pieces containing any from a family of filters.
    class  EmptyFeatureFilterConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Class for configuring a filter that adds, for each information piece without any feature, an empty feature.
    class  InformationFeatureSelectionFilterConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Class for configuring a filter which keeps only a fraction of the item features in a given set, and all the information pieces containing such features.
    class  MinimumFrequencyInformationFeatureFilterConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Class for configuring a filter which keeps only the information pieces feature available, at least, in a minimum number of information pieces.
    class  NumInformationPiecesFilterConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures filter which only leaves a fixed number of information pieces for each user to propagate.
    class  OnlyRepropagatedPiecesFilterConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a filter which keeps only those pieces which have been repropagated in a real setting.
    class  RelevantEdgesFilterConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a filter which, if a recommendation has been added to the original graph, keeps only those relevant recommended edges.
    class  WithCreatorFilterConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a filter which only keeps those information pieces with a creator.
    Methods in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.filter that return FilterConfigurator 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    FilterConfigurator<U,​I,​F> FilterSelector.selectConfig​(java.lang.String name)
    Selects a filter.
